pages.text: Ili challenge vi bring retribution DI neniam fails fulfill His prophecy! Tag your Lord est 1000 de your jar
Many community en des preter committed evil mi plumb them sur awhile tiam mi pun them. Al Me est ultimate destiny
dir O popol mi est send al vi as profound warner
Those kred plumb righteous life ind forgiveness generous recompense
As por those strive challenge our revelations ili incur Infer
Ni ne send vi any messenger nor prophet hav diabl interfere his wishes DI TIAM nullifies KI DIABL done DI PERFEKT His revelations. DI est Omniscient SAGX
Li tiel sets diabl scheme test those haven dub their kor those kor hard. wicked dev ceter opposition
Those ben knowledge recognize truth your Lord tiam kred en gxi their kor readily akcept gxi! plej assuredly DI direkt believers dekstr path
As por those disbelieve ili ad haven dub Hor ven them suddenly retribution terrible tag ven them
